channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects on some of the writings of Fr. Frederick William Faber of England concerning the Blessed Sacrament and some of the devotions we have - 40 Hours, Perpetual Adoration, visits. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: Former NFL Wide-Receiver Danny Abramowicz and team talk about countering envy with gratitude in this hard-hitting look at Catholic spirituality for men. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Hour Of The Laity
channel.desc: An interview with TV news anchor Monica Hannan from KFYR in Bismarck, North Dakota on the current state of the news media and a Catholic?s duty to speak the truth at all times. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: First Communion
channel.desc: Mischievous boys, under the misapprehension that a "pirate's treasure" is hidden somewhere in the village church, learn from an orphan girl that the greatest treasure is in the tabernacle, the Body and Blood of Jesus Christ. (30 minutes).
